body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<event>
    
    <uei>uei.opennms.org/createsituation</uei>
      <nodeid>3</nodeid>
      <!--<host>host</host>
       <severity>CRITICAL</severity>
       <source>SPMInterface</source>
       <descr>Hello first problem</descr> -->
       <!-- <time>2020-04-08T04:47:37.331-04:00</time> -->
       <!--      <descr>this:descrYYY</descr> -->
       <!--<logmsg>spm interface update.111</logmsg> -->
       <logmsg>updated situation</logmsg>
       <parms>
            <parm>
             <parmName>related-reductionKey-1</parmName>
             <value>uei.opennms.org/traps/CHUBB-TVBS-CAMERA-MIB/logicInputChange::3</value>
            </parm>
             <parm>
             <parmName>related-reductionKey-2</parmName>
             <value>uei.opennms.org/traps/CHUBB-TVBS-CAMERA-MIB/tamperDetected::3</value>
            </parm>
            <parm>
             <parmName>related-reductionKey-3</parmName>
             <value>uei.opennms.org/traps/CHUBB-TVBS-CAMERA-MIB/healthChange/panMotor::3</value>
            </parm>
            <parm>
             <parmName>situationGroup</parmName>
             <value>group1</value>
            </parm>
            
            
  
    </parms>
</event>
